title: The Art of Critical Thinking
description: A collection of thought-provoking quotes on critical thinking, reasoning, and intellectual growth.
author: AI Lab for Book-Lovers

quotes.quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Doubt is not a pleasant condition, but certainty is absurd.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: Real knowledge is to know the extent of one's ignorance.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin
